Params: {3: 'Ghost towns in deserts, underground facilities, sea-crossing bridges...'}
{3: 'The distance you have walked has far exceeded the boundaries of this facility.'}
{2: "We haven't just been walking in circles this whole time in the real world, have we?", 3: '6', 4: 'What a peculiar experience.', 5: '9'}

{3: "Having gathered enough data, Lee has completed his modifications to your terminal. As the restart command executes, the terminal's screen goes dark before lighting up again and immediately displaying a notification."}
{2: "Don't worry, I'm fine. Lee is with me. How are things looking on your end?", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm fine too, Commandant. No need to worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's just that I can't get the sealed gate to open no matter what I do...", 4: '1'}
{2: "The gate... You're still outside the facility?", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I was adjusting my Levi-Gun's trailing mode to get through the narrow opening when the gate suddenly regained power and closed. I couldn't stop it in time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "After the gate shut, there was immediately a powerful signal interference inside the facility. I couldn't determine your exact location or contact you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What happened on your side? Where's Lucia?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Based on Liv's account, we were likely affected by the interference right as we entered the facility at the entrance itself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can only determine a general area due to the signal interference.', 4: '1'}
{2: "We can't determine directions or distances accurately under this interference.", 3: '43'}
{2: "Liv, we need you to stay outside and make sure we're heading in the right direction.", 3: '44'}
